attributes.action: put all individual tax return data online.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For several years now the Norwegian government has published the income tax data of every single individual who is resident in Norway for taxation purposes. This information is picked-up by Norwegian daily newspapers and published on their websites 

If we were to follow suit here in the UK it would demonstrate to the world the level of commitment the government has towards freedom of information principles and openness, and would 
show-up any individuals who avoid or pay too little tax. HMRC could then follow-up any suspicions members of the public may have about people they know.
